title: Blind Beggar of Tivoli
marks: Signature and Mark LRC of image, in engraving: [Austin]
description: old man sitting on stool in front of cliff and village; wearing overcoat loosely draped over shoulders; eyes closed; holding crucifix and rosaries in PR hand, PL hand rests in bowl on lap; walking stick resting between legs
creditline: Gift of Robert Austin's daughters, Rachel and Clare
